Exaggerate: The claim does not appear to exaggerate any information. It provides factual details about the photos and their origin.
Understate: The claim does not understate any information. It accurately presents the photos and their context.
Falters at times: The claim does not seem to falter at any point. It provides consistent information about the photos and their source.
Lack enough support: The claim is supported by evidence such as the reverse image search and the tweet from the Kenya Airports Authority.
Problematic assumption: The claim does not make any problematic assumptions. It relies on verifiable evidence to support its statement.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not present any alternative explanations. It focuses on debunking the misleading nature of the photos.
